=Create Activity=

Link:


POST with params: 
title,
description,
check_facebook (it's checkbox, =1 is yes.),
facebook_share (test to share facebook),
check_newsletter (=1 is yes.),
newsletter_link,
check_facebook_page (=1 is yes.),
facebook_page,
check_calendar (=1 is yes),
calendar (in format YYYY/MM/DD).

Response in json file.
if created successful:

{
  "code": 1,
  "message": "Success",
}

or error:

{
  "code": 0,
  "message": "Fail",
}
